name: CrediTalent
description: Reputation-based loans connecting the Talent Passport/Builder Score to the amount of credit you can receive.
author: CrediTalent

name: Bondi Finance
description: Bondi Finance tokenizes corporate bonds to provide stable and high-yields, uncorrelated to crypto market conditions. We developed an insurance market (CDS) for bond tokens for this buildathon.
author: Bondi

name: CLPD, The Chilean Peso Stablecoin.
description: CLPD is a fully backed 1:1 redeemable chilean peso stablecoin on Base. It makes easier the onboarding of chileans onchain in a safe, fast and easy way and will enable access for millions into DeFi.
author: CLPToken

name: BOBC Stablecoin
description: Overcollateralized stablecoin, pegged to the BOB (Bolivian Boliviano) and backed by ETH
author: Rafael

name: BuildMyEvent
description: BuildMyEvent offers local organizers a secure, no-code platform for issuing NFT tickets at events in Latin America, with easy integration of our NFT ticketing API into your website.
author: BuildMyEvent

name: Sembrando el cambio with El chico de las plantas
description: An onchain platform to organize urban reforestation efforts, connect volunteers, and reward their participation, promoting environmental impact in Latin American cities, starting with Lima.
author: Jean

name: OpenVino
description:
OpenVino provides Tokenization, Traceability, and Transparency for the wine world. 
For this project we have developed new functionalities on Base!
author: OpenVino

name: AI Agent for Coinbase Wallet
description: Simplifying crypto for LATAM through real-time AI-powered voice interactions
author: Gonzalo
